title: The Dark Side of Honor: A Jack Dublin Novel
description: Retired cop, Jack Dublin's mother was killed 20 years ago and he knows his billionaire father had something to do with it. Today, Jack's son is kidnapped, his father is shot and his mother has reportedly been found alive being held captive in the jungles of Belize. What the hell is going on?In The Dark Side of Honor by S.T. Phillips, two worlds collide. In Belize, drug kingpin Jorge DePeralta - aka The Shark - ran his multi-billion dollar empire trafficking cocaine and literally feeding traitors to the four tiger sharks contained on his compound. Recently, his submarines containing the contraband have been seized. So DePeralta plans to come to the US to discuss joining forces with his arch rival Navarro. But his plans are altered when he learns that Waverly, a former cop, has been talking to his nephew about the dead woman found 20 years ago, burned beyond recognition and missing her teeth. In Washington DC, investigator Jack Dublin has been commissioned by his father, CEO of WISE, to find his mother's real killer. Will Jack's search for the truth unravel a 20-year-old CIA cover up?
author: S.T. Phillips
